about.title: Rwanda's Most Trusted Bus Service
about.subtitle: Connecting cities across Rwanda with safe, comfortable, and reliable transportation. Experience the difference of modern bus travel with Aby Ticket.
about.description: Since our establishment, Aby Ticket has been committed to providing exceptional bus services throughout Rwanda. We operate modern, well-maintained buses with professional drivers who prioritize your safety and comfort. Our extensive network connects major cities including Kigali, Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, and more.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: All our buses undergo regular maintenance checks and safety inspections. Our experienced drivers are trained in defensive driving and passenger safety protocols.

punctuality.title: On-Time Departures
punctuality.description: We value your time. Our buses depart on schedule, ensuring you reach your destination when you need to. Real-time tracking keeps you informed throughout your journey.

comfort.title: Comfortable Travel
comfort.description: Enjoy spacious seating, air conditioning, clean restrooms, and onboard entertainment. Our buses are designed for your comfort on both short and long journeys.

locations.subtitle: Travel Across Rwanda
locations.title: We Connect Every Corner
locations.description: Book safe, comfortable, and affordable bus tickets to all major destinations in Rwanda.
locations.ctaDesc: Over 50+ daily departures to Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, and beyond.

hero.title: Travel Rwanda with Ease & Comfort
hero.subtitle: Book tickets from trusted operators to any destination — safe, fast, and reliable.

bookingProcess.title: Simple steps to book your bus ticket
bookingProcess.subtitle: Book your bus ticket in three easy ways - through our website, mobile app, or using USSD code. Fast, secure, and convenient booking at your fingertips.

choose.title: Choose Your Journey
choose.content: Select your departure and destination cities, pick your preferred travel date and time. Browse available routes from Kigali to Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, and more. Compare prices and bus operators to find the perfect option.

book.title: Book Your Ticket
book.content: Complete your booking through our website, mobile app, or dial *334# for USSD. Choose your seat, add passenger details, and pay securely via Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), card, or cash at our offices.

travel.title: Travel With Ease
travel.content: Receive your e-ticket via SMS and email instantly. Show your ticket code at the bus station, board your bus, and enjoy a comfortable journey. Track your bus location in real-time through our app.

faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: Everything you need to know about booking tickets
faq.q1: How do I book a bus ticket?
faq.a1: You can easily book tickets online by selecting your cities, choosing your travel time, and confirming payment through our secure system.
faq.q2: Can I cancel or change my booking?
faq.a2: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before departure. Some restrictions may apply for peak times.
faq.q3: Are there discounts for students or seniors?
faq.a3: Yes, discounted fares are available for students and seniors with valid ID.
faq.a4: We accept debit/credit cards, mobile money, and other local payment options.
faq.q5: Do I need to print my ticket?
faq.a5: No, e-tickets are accepted. Just show your ticket on your phone when boarding.
